name: dissonantly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that sounds strange or unpleasant: The musical components support the action on stage, sometimes dissonantly. The church bells clanged dissonantly every Sunday morning.
More examplesFewer examplesThe unfamiliar tones of her voice rang dissonantly in his ears.The piece begins harmoniously, but ends dissonantly. The sound of engines and squealing brakes broke dissonantly across the peace of the morning.The opera combines elements of traditional jazz with the composer's dissonantly percussive style.
